product_name: REI  Midweight Polartec Power Dry Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's
long_description: Working up a sweat in cold weather? The men's REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry long underwear bottoms move moisture away from your skin and dry quickly so you can stay and play longer.
short_description: Working up a sweat in cold weather? The men's REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry long underwear bottoms move moisture away from your skin and dry quickly so you can stay and play longer.
